name: ListNotification
description: Retrieve a list of notifications belonging to the account used to make the request

AccountSid.description: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) that created the Notification resources to read.

Log.description: Only read notifications of the specified log level. Can be:  `0` to read only ERROR notifications or `1` to read only WARNING notifications. By default, all notifications are read.

MessageDate.description: Only show notifications for the specified date, formatted as `YYYY-MM-DD`. You can also specify an inequality, such as `<=YYYY-MM-DD` for messages logged at or before midnight on a date, or `>=YYYY-MM-DD` for messages logged at or after midnight on a date.

MessageDate<.description: Only show notifications for the specified date, formatted as `YYYY-MM-DD`. You can also specify an inequality, such as `<=YYYY-MM-DD` for messages logged at or before midnight on a date, or `>=YYYY-MM-DD` for messages logged at or after midnight on a date.

MessageDate>.description: Only show notifications for the specified date, formatted as `YYYY-MM-DD`. You can also specify an inequality, such as `<=YYYY-MM-DD` for messages logged at or before midnight on a date, or `>=YYYY-MM-DD` for messages logged at or after midnight on a date.

PageSize.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.

Page.description: The page index. This value is simply for client state.

PageToken.description: The page token. This is provided by the API.
